basics.name: Sujay Alaspure
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a web developer having 3+ years of experience in front-end and mobile app development.
basics.objective: I like to go the extra mile to put together well-developed code which is fit for purpose, and functionally correct. On a personal level, I am loaded with energy, passion, and patience.

work.name: Robosoft Technologies
work.summary:
* Implemented the **offline first functionality** from scratch using **MongoDB Realm** database which reduces the app latency by **90%**
* Managed a process of re-engineering mobile Applications to improve end-to-end service processes.
* Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of developers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis
* Tech stack worked on -> **React-Native, ReactJs, Typescript, REST APIs**

work.name: Indivisible Solutions
work.summary:
* Co-founded a startup aiming to develop affordable **smart home solution** products
* Developed and shipped highly interactive mobile applications [**SmartHM**](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.indivisible.smarthm)
* Worked on various Framework and CMS such as React, **React Native**, WordPress CMS, Firebase, **MS Appcenter**, etc
* Architected and implemented the front-end of company website and various internal tools.

work.name: TCS
work.summary:
* Developed modern, performant, and robust code for a diverse array of client and internal projects.
* Took **ownership of the development of an Automation testing utility** using Selenium Framework in Java. This helps in reducing the manual testing efforts by **90%** and soft saving
**$15000 annually**.
* Worked with a variety of different languages, frameworks, and tools such as **Selenium**, **Bash Script**, **Jenkins**, **JavaScript**, React, etc.

activities.involvements:
* **[SmartHM](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.indivisible.smarthm)** - An application built to control the home appliances using IoT Technology. Developed using **React Native, MS Appcenter**, and Firebase.
 * Implemented an automation testing utility using selenium for more diligent levels of regression testing, negative testing, error/bug retests, and usability.
 * **Research paper published in [IJARCCE](https://ijarcce.com/papers/two-way-wireless-mesh-network-data-sharing-between-esp8266-without-internet/)** -  Two Way Wireless Mesh Network Data Sharing between ESP8266. **(paper ID: IJARCCE.2019.8805)**
activities.achievements:
* **Patent** - IoT based Smart StreetLight System #202121025261
*  **Special Achievement award** for consistently exceeding the performance by TCS
* Recognition of zero defect delivery
* **5 Star** Rating of the first anniversary by TCS
* Winner of Robotics Competition at VNIT, Nagpur
